verses.verse: And it came to pass<WH1961> after<WH310> these<WH428> things,<WH1697> that God<WH430> did tempt<WH5254> <WH853> Abraham,<WH85> and said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, Abraham:<WH85> and he said,<WH559> Behold,<WH2009> here I am.

And he said,<WH559> Take<WH3947> now<WH4994> <WH853> thy son,<WH1121> <WH853> thine only<WH3173> son<WH853> Isaac,<WH3327> whom<WH834> thou lovest,<WH157> and get<WH1980> thee into<WH413> the land<WH776> of Moriah;<WH4179> and offer<WH5927> him there<WH8033> for a burnt offering<WH5930> upon<WH5921> one<WH259> of the mountains<WH2022> which<WH834> I will tell<WH559> thee of.<WH413>

And Abraham<WH85> rose up early<WH7925> in the morning,<WH1242> and saddled<WH2280> <WH853> his ass,<WH2543> and took<WH3947> <WH853> two<WH8147> of his young men<WH5288> with<WH854> him, and Isaac<WH3327> his son,<WH1121> and cleaved<WH1234> the wood<WH6086> for the burnt offering,<WH5930> and rose up,<WH6965> and went<WH1980> unto<WH413> the place<WH4725> of which<WH834> God<WH430> had told<WH559> him.
Then on the third<WH7992> day<WH3117> Abraham<WH85> lifted up<WH5375> <WH853> his eyes,<WH5869> and saw<WH7200> <WH853> the place<WH4725> afar off.<WH4480> <WH7350>

And Abraham<WH85> said<WH559> unto<WH413> his young men,<WH5288> Abide<WH3427> ye here<WH6311> with<WH5973> the ass;<WH2543> and I<WH589> and the lad<WH5288> will go<WH1980> yonder<WH5704> <WH3541> and worship,<WH7812> and come again<WH7725> to<WH413> you.

And Abraham<WH85> took<WH3947> <WH853> the wood<WH6086> of the burnt offering,<WH5930> and laid<WH7760> it upon<WH5921> Isaac<WH3327> his son;<WH1121> and he took<WH3947> <WH853> the fire<WH784> in his hand,<WH3027> and a knife;<WH3979> and they went<WH1980> both<WH8147> of them together.<WH3162>

And Isaac<WH3327> spoke<WH559> unto<WH413> Abraham<WH85> his father,<WH1> and said,<WH559> My father:<WH1> and he said,<WH559> Here<WH2009> am I, my son.<WH1121> And he said,<WH559> Behold<WH2009> the fire<WH784> and the wood:<WH6086> but where<WH346> is the lamb<WH7716> for a burnt offering?<WH5930>
And Abraham<WH85> said,<WH559> My son,<WH1121> God<WH430> will provide<WH7200> himself a lamb<WH7716> for a burnt offering:<WH5930> so they went<WH1980> both<WH8147> of them together.<WH3162>

And they came<WH935> to<WH413> the place<WH4725> which<WH834> God<WH430> had told<WH559> him of; and Abraham<WH85> built<WH1129> <WH853> an altar<WH4196> there,<WH8033> and laid the wood in order,<WH6186> <WH853> <WH6086> and bound<WH6123> <WH853> Isaac<WH3327> his son,<WH1121> and laid<WH7760> him on<WH5921> the altar<WH4196> upon<WH4480> <WH4605> the wood.<WH6086>
And Abraham<WH85> stretched forth<WH7971> <WH853> his hand,<WH3027> and took<WH3947> <WH853> the knife<WH3979> to slay<WH7819> <WH853> his son.<WH1121>
And the angel<WH4397> of the LORD<WH3068> called<WH7121> unto<WH413> him out of<WH4480> heaven,<WH8064> and said,<WH559> Abraham,<WH85> Abraham:<WH85> and he said,<WH559> Here<WH2009> am I.

And he said,<WH559> Lay<WH7971> not<WH408> thine hand<WH3027> upon<WH413> the lad,<WH5288> neither<WH408> do<WH6213> thou any thing<WH3972> unto him: for<WH3588> now<WH6258> I know<WH3045> that<WH3588> thou<WH859> fearest<WH3373> God,<WH430> seeing thou hast not<WH3808> withheld<WH2820> <WH853> thy son,<WH1121> <WH853> thine only<WH3173> son from<WH4480> me.

And Abraham<WH85> lifted up<WH5375> <WH853> his eyes,<WH5869> and looked,<WH7200> and behold<WH2009> behind<WH310> him a ram<WH352> caught<WH270> in a thicket<WH5442> by his horns:<WH7161> and Abraham<WH85> went<WH1980> and took<WH3947> <WH853> the ram,<WH352> and offered him up<WH5927> for a burnt offering<WH5930> in the stead of<WH8478> his son.<WH1121>

And Abraham<WH85> called<WH7121> the name<WH8034> of that<WH1931> place<WH4725> Jehovah-jireh:<WH3070> as<WH834> it is said<WH559> to this day,<WH3117> In the mount<WH2022> of the LORD<WH3068> it shall be seen.<WH7200>
And the angel<WH4397> of the LORD<WH3068> called<WH7121> unto<WH413> Abraham<WH85> out of<WH4480> heaven<WH8064> the second time,<WH8145>

And said,<WH559> By myself have I sworn,<WH7650> saith<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> for<WH3588> because<WH3282> <WH834> thou hast done<WH6213> <WH853> this<WH2088> thing,<WH1697> and hast not<WH3808> withheld<WH2820> <WH853> thy son,<WH1121> <WH853> thine only<WH3173> son:

That <WH3588> in blessing<WH1288> I will bless<WH1288> thee, and in multiplying<WH7235> I will multiply<WH7235> <WH853> thy seed<WH2233> as the stars<WH3556> of the heaven,<WH8064> and as the sand<WH2344> which<WH834> is upon<WH5921> the sea<WH3220> shore;<WH8193> and thy seed<WH2233> shall possess<WH3423> <WH853> the gate<WH8179> of his enemies;<WH341>
And in thy seed<WH2233> shall all<WH3605> the nations<WH1471> of the earth<WH776> be blessed;<WH1288> because<WH6118> <WH834> thou hast obeyed<WH8085> my voice.<WH6963>

So Abraham<WH85> returned<WH7725> unto<WH413> his young men,<WH5288> and they rose up<WH6965> and went<WH1980> together<WH3162> to<WH413> Beer-sheba;<WH884> and Abraham<WH85> dwelt<WH3427> at Beer-sheba.<WH884>

And it came to pass<WH1961> after<WH310> these<WH428> things,<WH1697> that it was told<WH5046> Abraham,<WH85> saying,<WH559> Behold,<WH2009> Milcah,<WH4435> she<WH1931> hath also<WH1571> born<WH3205> children<WH1121> unto thy brother<WH251> Nahor;<WH5152>
<WH853> Huz<WH5780> his firstborn,<WH1060> and Buz<WH938> his brother,<WH251> and Kemuel<WH7055> the father<WH1> of Aram,<WH758>
And Chesed,<WH3777> and Hazo,<WH2375> and Pildash,<WH6394> and Jidlaph,<WH3044> and Bethuel.<WH1328>
And Bethuel<WH1328> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Rebekah:<WH7259> these<WH428> eight<WH8083> Milcah<WH4435> did bear<WH3205> to Nahor,<WH5152> Abraham's<WH85> brother.<WH251>
And his concubine,<WH6370> whose name<WH8034> was Reumah,<WH7208> she<WH1931> bore<WH3205> also<WH1571> <WH853> Tebah,<WH2875> and Gaham,<WH1514> and Thahash,<WH8477> and Maachah.<WH4601>
